title: *2 months FREE* Breathtaking Views at This Brand New ATX Property
posting_body: Prorated monthly rent after 1 month free is $2,500!
If you're looking for a brand new, quiet, scenic and downright beautiful new apartment home then look no further!
This community has some seriously excellent panoramic views of Austin and its rolling hills.
These apartments have 10 foot ceilings, hickory hardwood floors, a spacious balcony, a large walk in closet and a washer/dryer that will be provided to you!
If you spend a lot of time in the kitchen, you will be working with stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops throughout and a extra deep kitchen sink!

This apartment home is hosting a impressive amount of onsite amenities including a large 24-hour gym, dog parks, pet washing stations, java bars, outdoor fire side lounge and a resort style swimming pool with lap lanes and covered cabanas!
You will even be surrounded by the barton creek habitat preserve.

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
